instruction: Develop an app that teaches math
output: The app should include interactive tutorial sessions, quizzes and tests to track progress, and rewards to motivate users. To make the math lessons more engaging, the app can include visual elements such as charts, graphs, and pictures. Students should have the option to choose their own difficulty level and progress at their own pace. Furthermore, the app can contain an online messaging platform that allows students to share and discuss questions and solutions with peers and teachers.
